title: Riot Plz help fix this glitch already!!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
iv done everything you guys tell me to do from connection issues to removing firewalls to changing dns to everything to try tofix this and i cant it always says calculating difference and stops around 3500 files and then this always shows iv looked and scoured the internet again and again and havent found a thing , it also says 33% next to the bar, so can you plz help me fix this i miss playing


https://gyazo.com/1005384d75977ecb01f5d2bc145dd882

replies.body: The error you are receiving indicates that you might have a connection issue.  The patcher needs to download content but it being blocked.  If the[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide wasn't able to help resolve this, reach out to our team team for assistance by submitting a ticket.  We can take a deeper look and figure out what's going on.

To supplement your post;

Here's the link to Riot’s [Technical Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 


* For the secondary category, select **I’m having problems with my patcher / patching the game**




https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HCCc9VGLMBs/VvGim_HT2MI/AAAAAAAA5EU/CQi6aIgFrm0rtxw5hZl4Al3mMP3k3JAyg/s1600/Lissandra_Splash_3.jpg



[Need help obtaining logs? Soraka will be your aide! ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)


https://static2.lolwallpapers.net/2016/04/57010692ced3c.jpg
